statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id > 100;
SELECT treatment_history FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT lab_results FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, lab_results FROM patient_medical_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_history FROM patient_medical_records WHERE lab_results LIKE '%normal%';
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' AND treatment_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE address='123 University Street';
SELECT patient_id, phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE consultation_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, lab_results FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE consultation_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.lab_results FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, name, test_name FROM patients JOIN lab_results ON patients.patient_id = lab_results.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age >= 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT treatment_id, patient_id, treatment_date, treatment_description FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT p.name, l.test_name, l.result FROM patients p INNER JOIN lab_results l ON p.patient_id = l.patient_id WHERE l.result <> 'Normal';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT lab_results.test_name, lab_results.result_value, treatments.treatment_description FROM lab_results JOIN treatments ON lab_results.record_id = treatments.record_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records INNER JOIN patients ON medical_records.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.first_name = 'John';
SELECT lab_results.test_name, lab_results.result_value FROM lab_results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value DESC;

SELECT patients.first_name, treatments.treatment_description FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id JOIN treatments ON medical_records.record_id = treatments.record_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_description FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT result_id, medical_test, result FROM lab_results ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patients.name, patients.address, treatments.treatment_description FROM patients LEFT JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;

SELECT consultations.consultation_date, patients.name AS patient_name, medical_staff.name AS doctor_name FROM consultations JOIN patients ON consultations.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN medical_staff ON consultations.doctor_name = medical_staff.name;
SELECT lab_results.result_id, lab_results.medical_test, patients.name FROM lab_results JOIN patients ON lab_results.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE lab_results.result = 'Positive';
